configurations.name: E2E: Maestro (Android)
configurations.command: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "& { if (-not (Test-Path '.tools/maestro/maestro/bin/maestro') -and -not (Test-Path '.tools/maestro/maestro/bin/maestro.exe')) { yarn e2e:maestro:install:win }; .\.tools\maestro\maestro\bin\maestro test e2e\maestro\login-and-tabs.yaml }"
